snippet.title: Dive in to a great home
snippet.content:
This fantastic home has been meticulously cared for and recently has undergone a significant make-over to allow the new owner to just turn the key and move in. m.
NOOSAVILLE 8 Lintott Court 4 Bed, 2 Bath, 2 Car, Pool Features: Significant make-over, private position at top of cul-de-sac, solar power, outdoor entertaining, saltwater pool and spa, close to river, Gympie Tce, private school, public transport and Noosa Civic Price: Offers over $735,000 Agent: Trevor Elliott and Narelle Leis at HANGloosa Property Noosa Contact: 0418 738 249, 0418 738 811 Inspection: By appointment Tourist track takes toll with plenty of motorists caught out Latest weather data points to big dry SELANGOR Private Hospital has celebrated its 70th birthday. Some really big bands came through Stewart's at Alexandra Headland. A soul, funk and reggae outfit will headline Peregian Originals Bras and Bikes charity motorcycle ride is now in its 16th year EVERY mum wants to see their child live a long, happy life Ali Oetjen appeared on the first season The brief ads tease that the beloved mother-daughter duo "are back". FANTASY series thrown into chaos as hackers leak top secret scripts. Three contestants reveal lesbian encounters. Botched stunt does $40,000 worth of damage. THE Reef Hotel was the centre of Noosa's social scene. She tried calling police, but ended up getting arrested herself. "We've been told that it has the best beaches and snorkelling." Three potential sites have been identified by city leaders The house featured on TV series Grand Designs Australia in 2014
